sentences.sContent: When would be the best time to start weaning my baby?
sentences.sCn: 什么时候开始给我的孩子断奶最好呢？

remMethod.val: 那孩子会自己穿衣 (wear)， 早该断奶(wean)了 → 使断奶

trans.tranCn: 使断奶； 使丢弃， 使断念
trans.tranOther: to gradually stop feeding a baby or young animal on its mother’s milk and start giving it ordinary food
